name: Surviving the Wild: New York
description:
This game is set in a post-apocalyptic New York, covered in vegetation and water. The player controls a boy who woke up in this world and needs to survive along the buildings, collecting resources that the vegetation left behind. The objective is to reach the top of a building and turn on a radio signal to call for help. However, black shadows appear during the night and attempt to consume the player. Throughout the game, the player will find messages left by another person who passed before him, which will help him complete the game.

Credits:

NYC: GEOPIPE, INC. Textures modify by: Flyber

Character And Animations: Mixamo Fuse

Music and SFX:  rhythmpeople and Pixbay

Environments: asset from elijahcobden, and modify by: Flyber
